name: 3rd International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies
content: Call for paper 2019 3rd International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies (AIAAT 2019) Aug.1-3, 2019 ｜Beijing, China http://aiaat.org/ 2019 3rd International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies (AIAAT 2019). AIAAT 2019 will be held in Beijing, China from Aug.1-3, 2019, which is organized by Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers (HKSME), Sponsored by Donghua University and technical, Fudan University,Xidian University and York Univeristy. This conference is aimed at providing a platform for all researchers and engineers to share ideas, highly developed skills and successful practices to others. We would like to invite you to join us in this important event and share your recent advance development and research finding in Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies to all attendees.We're looking forward to seeing you in AIAAT 2019\. ●Publication and Indexing 1\. All accepted and registered papers will be included in IOP Conference Series: Materials Science and Engineering (ISSN: 1757-899X) ,which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other databases. 2.Selected papers with high quality will be recommended to publish in the Special Issue of "Smart Sensors and Devices in Artificial Intelligence", which is a special issue of Sensors (ISSN 1424-8220), indexed by SCIE, EI, Scopus. Impact Factor: 2.475\. 3.Selected excellent presented papers with extension will be recommended to publish in the Special Issue of Future Internet (ISSN 1999-5903),which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and the Emerging Sources Citation Index (ESCI - Web of Science). #The Conference Proceeding of AIAAT 2018 was be IOP Conference Series: Materials Science and Engineering.(Volume 435)and was indexed by EI ●AIAAT 2019 Speakers 1\. Prof. Dan Zhang,York University, Canada Dr. Zhang is a Fellow of the Canadian Academy of Engineering (CAE), a Fellow of the Engineering Institute of Canada (EIC), a Fellow of American Society of Mechanical Engineers (ASME), and a Fellow of Canadian Society for Mechanical Engineering (CSME), a Senior Member IEEE, and a Senior Member of SME.Dr. Dan Zhang is a Kaneff Professor and Tier 1 York Research Chair in Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics at York University.Dr. Zhang's research interests include robotics and mechatronics; high performance parallel robotic machine development; sustainable/green manufacturing systems; rehabilitation robot and rescue robot. 2\. Prof. Xiaolin Zhang, Shanghai Institute of Microsystem and Information Technology, Chinese Acadamy Sceinces, China Researcher and doctoral supervisor of Shanghai Institute of Microsystem and Information Technology, Chinese Acadamy Sceinces. Director of the bionic vision system laboratory, Shanghai institute of Microsystems and information technology, Chinese academy of sciences. Responsible person of science and technology innovation action plan of Shanghai science and technology commission. Research direction: bionic robot vision and binocular vision sensing technology. 3\. Prof. Makoto Iwasaki,Nagoya Institute of Technology, Japan Fellow of IEEE Industrial Electronics Society, The Institute of Electrical Engineers of Japan,The Japan Society for Precision Engineering.Recent research field:Development of Intelligent Motion Control,Application of Soft Computing Techniques to Motion Control,High Performance Positioning Methodology in Mechatronic Products 4.Prof. Hanxiong Li, The City University of Hong Kong, HK Distinguished Expert by China Federation of Returned Overseas,Distinguished Expert by Hunan Government, China.Awarded Distinguished Expert in Thousand Talents Program 5.Prof. Duan Zhuohua, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, Zhongshan Institute, China Prof. Duan Zhuohua is a member of Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence(CAAI), Member of the China Computer Federation,Member of the Guangdong Computer Society. His research interests include artificial intelligence, robot navigation, fault diagnosis and machine game. 6.Prof. Zhufeng Shao, Tsinghua University, China Associate Prof.Shaofocus his research on cable-driven parallel mechanism, parallel mechanism,system integration and intelligent manufacturing system. He won second prize of Natural Science Award of Ministry of Education of China in 2014 andgrand prize of China Machinery Industry Science and Technology Award in 2015\. Hepresented more than 40 papers indexed by SCI and EI, owned 25 authorized Chinese Invention patents. 7.Dr. Haijun SHAN, Zhejiang Lab, China Ph.D., is currently a researcher at Zhejiang Lab. He received his bachelor’s degree from Zhejiang University in 2009, and then received his doctor’s degreein Automatic Control Theory from Zhejiang University in 2015.His main research interests are machine learning, computer vision, and cloud computing. Dr. Shan has combined background in academic research and enterprise project development. ●Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to: Artificial Neural Networks Artificial Intelligence tools & Applications Bayesian Networks Natural Language Processing Neuroinformatics Robotics Evolutionary Inspired Computing Foundations of Artificial Intelligence Fuzzy Logic and Methods More topics can be found at: http://aiaat.org/cfp.html ●Paper Submission 1.You can choose to submit your paper directly to aiaat@smehk.org 2.You can submit your full paper through electronic submission system: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/AIAAT2019 ●Call for participants 1,Presenter:If you are interested in presenting your research on the conference, without publishing your paper in the proceeding, please submit the abstract to us! 2,Listener:If you are interested in attending the conference to know other scholar's research achaivements and share with them your ideas, you are welcome to send the reigstration form to us through aiaat@smehk.org. 3,Reviewer:Experts in the area of Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies are welcome to join the conference as reviewer. If you are interested in reviewing the papers, please send your latest CV to aiaat@smehk.org. ●Contact Us: If you have any question, please feel free to contact our conference secretary. Ms.Amber Cao Tel:+852-30506862 Welcome you to contact us by Email to aiaat@smehk.org http://aiaat.org/ Wechat: HKSME15756362251
organizers: Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers (HKSME)
